item.title: Welcom back to the Page >_<
item.description: When suddenly remember I have the blog: Go to the blog folder and open the Shell: Hugo server Search for How to write Markdown Check Hugo Academic if need New Post, Project, Publication Run git pull After changing, build public folder Run git clone https://github.com/r-zh/r-zh.github.io.git After changing, Upload the new commit 2020’s Plan Thesis Defence soon learning Python Django Rich personal website - Structure for every post Drive license Join one vulunteer activity French Language 200 words 30 expression Grammar Exercise Taichi 24 Savate Iaido

item.title: Preparing For Exams
item.description: During the Study About the coming lecture (within 24 hours) Preview the materials before the lecture. Make copy of slides and add notes During the lecture. Organized notes in textbook as a resource. Here is “what I learn” after lecture. Memorize Chunking: Put the complex bodies into smaller chunks. Ex. how do you remember the phone number? 5141231357? or 514-123-4757? Classifying, summarizing, categorizing, sequencing, grouping, using acronyms, mnemonics

item.title: Exercise in Different Culture
item.description: Savate 八段锦 形意拳 Iaido

item.title: Consideration before Rental
item.description: Bad experience Don’t trust the landload compeletely. Before getting the key and clean house, don’t pay anything. Confirm which room, which floor. Check the door, make sure it won’t be locked by itself. Make sure the time to moving the luggage, be clear at which day and hour. If it changes, remind what was discussed before and ask why. Confirm 10 minutes early if it is not clear at time.

item.title: DIY Dishes
item.description:
邻居家小孩都馋哭了系列 所谓在家靠父母，出门吃饭还是自己做便宜。外面的菜太贵了，忒贵了，老贵了，自己做点，吃的时候要记得看着《风味人间》！ 京酱肉丝 准备好肉，甜面酱，豆瓣酱，葱，姜，老抽，淀粉 处理材料 水淀粉中淀粉要少，显得水有点浑就行 肉的精瘦部分切成丝，和水淀粉放在一块，肥的部分剁一剁，放在碗里备用 葱、姜切成丁 肥肉下锅，中火熬（很长一段时间）油， 然后放葱姜炒出香味 一定要开大火，将肉和水淀粉放在锅里翻炒 待至七成熟，放入2勺甜面酱，1勺豆瓣酱，加一点点老抽染色，翻炒至尝一口觉得还行，就可以盛出来了 青椒肉丝 准备好肉，葱，姜，菜椒，老抽，淀粉 处理材料 水淀粉中淀粉要少，显得水有点浑就行 肉的精瘦部分切成丝，和水淀粉放在一块，肥的部分剁一剁，放在碗里备用 葱切成丁，菜椒切成丝 肥肉下锅，中火熬（很长一段时间）油， 然后放葱姜炒出香味 一定要开大火，将肉和水淀粉放在锅里翻炒 待至七成熟，加一点点老抽染色，放入菜椒丝，翻炒至尝一口觉得还行，就可以盛出来了 如果有隔天剩的米饭，而且还想吃个炒鸡蛋的话，就勇敢地去做吧，好吃的菜百搭 家庭专用火锅 准备材料：香菇 泡面 白菜 羊肉 酒
吃完肉后，喝一杯浓茶帮助消化，人生极大乐事

item.title: French Learning Tips
item.description: Standards: Just focus on the words what we use most in chatting: Compared with our own language, habit, culture, self-introduce Be postive to talk with native speakers: Language is used to let other undersand us 200 words Conjonction Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning et and ou or autre other d’abord first aussi also mais but peut-être maybe ensuite then, hence pour for toutefois however si if donc therefore moi aussi me too pas moi not me même same alors so, then depuis since dans in sur on à at quoi de plus what’s more bien que although par by par per assez enough plutôt rather trés very ne pas not Verbe Words Meaning Example Words Meaning Example être to be Êtes-vous marié?

item.title: Git Commands in Usage
item.description: Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent. Category Source code Website Code Creation Manually Automatically File type .md .html Usage Edit the Content Display the Information Folder hugo root public Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git.

item.title: Mobile Development Summary
item.description: If you are urgent to create the App. Follow the link APICloud Gonative They have the service for generate Mobile App automatically with H5 Webpages’ link.

item.title: Photoshop Tips
item.description: Create the dynamic picture 导入图片 File -> 设置图片大小（宽500px） 打开时间轴控件 逆向并设置时间 设置过度（每张1秒，间隔20张） 存储为网页可识别
